actions.name: AcceptSharedDirectory
actions.description: Accepts a directory sharing request that was sent from the directory owner account.

actions.name: AddIpRoutes
actions.description: Adds a CIDR address block to correctly route traffic to and from your Microsoft AD on Amazon Web Services

actions.name: AddRegion
actions.description: Adds two domain controllers in the specified Region for the specified directory.

actions.name: AddTagsToResource
actions.description: Adds or overwrites one or more tags for the specified Amazon Directory Services directory.

actions.name: AuthorizeApplication
actions.description: Authorizes an application for your AWS Directory.

actions.name: CancelSchemaExtension
actions.description: Cancels an in-progress schema extension to a Microsoft AD directory.

actions.name: CheckAlias
actions.description: Verifies that the alias is available for use.

actions.name: ConnectDirectory
actions.description: Creates an AD Connector to connect to an on-premises directory.
dependentActions: ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress                                                                                        ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress                                                                                        ec2:CreateNetworkInterface                                                                                        ec2:CreateSecurityGroup                                                                                        ec2:CreateTags                                                                                        ec2:DescribeNetworkInterfaces                                                                                        ec2:DescribeSubnets                                                                                        ec2:DescribeVpcs

actions.name: CreateAlias
actions.description: Creates an alias for a directory and assigns the alias to the directory.

actions.name: CreateComputer
actions.description: Creates a computer account in the specified directory, and joins the computer to the directory.

actions.name: CreateConditionalForwarder
actions.description: Creates a conditional forwarder associated with your AWS directory.

actions.name: CreateDirectory
actions.description: Creates a Simple AD directory.
dependentActions: ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress                                                                                        ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress                                                                                        ec2:CreateNetworkInterface                                                                                        ec2:CreateSecurityGroup                                                                                        ec2:CreateTags                                                                                        ec2:DescribeNetworkInterfaces                                                                                        ec2:DescribeSubnets                                                                                        ec2:DescribeVpcs

actions.name: CreateIdentityPoolDirectory
actions.description: Creates a IdentityPool Directory in the AWS cloud.

actions.name: CreateLogSubscription
actions.description: Creates a subscription to forward real time Directory Service domain controller security logs to the specified CloudWatch log group in your AWS account.

actions.name: CreateMicrosoftAD
actions.description: Creates a Microsoft AD in the AWS cloud.
dependentActions: ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress                                                                                        ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress                                                                                        ec2:CreateNetworkInterface                                                                                        ec2:CreateSecurityGroup                                                                                        ec2:CreateTags                                                                                        ec2:DescribeNetworkInterfaces                                                                                        ec2:DescribeSubnets                                                                                        ec2:DescribeVpcs

actions.name: CreateSnapshot
actions.description: Creates a snapshot of a Simple AD or Microsoft AD directory in the AWS cloud.

actions.name: CreateTrust
actions.description: Initiates the creation of the AWS side of a trust relationship between a Microsoft AD in the AWS cloud and an external domain.

actions.name: DeleteConditionalForwarder
actions.description: Deletes a conditional forwarder that has been set up for your AWS directory.

actions.name: DeleteDirectory
actions.description: Deletes an AWS Directory Service directory.

actions.name: DeleteLogSubscription
actions.description: Deletes the specified log subscription.

actions.name: DeleteSnapshot
actions.description: Deletes a directory snapshot.

actions.name: DeleteTrust
actions.description: Deletes an existing trust relationship between your Microsoft AD in the AWS cloud and an external domain.

actions.name: DeregisterCertificate
actions.description: Deletes from the system the certificate that was registered for a secured LDAP connection.

actions.name: DeregisterEventTopic
actions.description: Removes the specified directory as a publisher to the specified SNS topic.

actions.name: DescribeCertificate
actions.description: Displays information about the certificate registered for a secured LDAP connection.

actions.name: DescribeConditionalForwarders
actions.description: Obtains information about the conditional forwarders for this account.

actions.name: DescribeDirectories
actions.description: Obtains information about the directories that belong to this account.

actions.name: DescribeDomainControllers
actions.description: Provides information about any domain controllers in your directory.

actions.name: DescribeEventTopics
actions.description: Obtains information about which SNS topics receive status messages from the specified directory.

actions.name: DescribeLDAPSSettings
actions.description: Describes the status of LDAP security for the specified directory.

actions.name: DescribeRegions
actions.description: Provides information about the Regions that are configured for multi-Region replication.

actions.name: DescribeSharedDirectories
actions.description: Returns the shared directories in your account.

actions.name: DescribeSnapshots
actions.description: Obtains information about the directory snapshots that belong to this account.

actions.name: DescribeTrusts
actions.description: Obtains information about the trust relationships for this account.

actions.name: DisableClientAuthentication
actions.description: Disables alternative client authentication methods for the specified directory.

actions.name: DisableLDAPS
actions.description: Deactivates LDAP secure calls for the specified directory.

actions.name: DisableRadius
actions.description: Disables multi-factor authentication (MFA) with the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) server for an AD Connector directory.

actions.name: DisableSso
actions.description: Disables single-sign on for a directory.

actions.name: EnableClientAuthentication
actions.description: Enables alternative client authentication methods for the specified directory.

actions.name: EnableLDAPS
actions.description: Activates the switch for the specific directory to always use LDAP secure calls.

actions.name: EnableRadius
actions.description: Enables multi-factor authentication (MFA) with the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) server for an AD Connector directory.

actions.name: EnableSso
actions.description: Enables single-sign on for a directory.

actions.name: GetDirectoryLimits
actions.description: Obtains directory limit information for the current region.

actions.name: GetSnapshotLimits
actions.description: Obtains the manual snapshot limits for a directory.

actions.name: ListAuthorizedApplications
actions.description: Obtains the aws applications authorized for a directory.

actions.name: ListCertificates
actions.description: For the specified directory, lists all the certificates registered for a secured LDAP connection.

actions.name: ListIpRoutes
actions.description: Lists the address blocks that you have added to a directory.

actions.name: ListLogSubscriptions
actions.description: Lists the active log subscriptions for the AWS account.

actions.name: ListSchemaExtensions
actions.description: Lists all schema extensions applied to a Microsoft AD Directory.

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Lists all tags on an Amazon Directory Services directory.

actions.name: RegisterCertificate
actions.description: Registers a certificate for secured LDAP connection.

actions.name: RegisterEventTopic
actions.description: Associates a directory with an SNS topic.

actions.name: RejectSharedDirectory
actions.description: Rejects a directory sharing request that was sent from the directory owner account.

actions.name: RemoveIpRoutes
actions.description: Removes IP address blocks from a directory.

actions.name: RemoveRegion
actions.description: Stops all replication and removes the domain controllers from the specified Region. You cannot remove the primary Region with this operation.

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromResource
actions.description: Removes tags from an Amazon Directory Services directory.

actions.name: ResetUserPassword
actions.description: Resets the password for any user in your AWS Managed Microsoft AD or Simple AD directory.

actions.name: RestoreFromSnapshot
actions.description: Restores a directory using an existing directory snapshot.

actions.name: ShareDirectory
actions.description: Shares a specified directory in your AWS account (directory owner) with another AWS account (directory consumer). With this operation you can use your directory from any AWS account and from any Amazon VPC within an AWS Region.

actions.name: StartSchemaExtension
actions.description: Applies a schema extension to a Microsoft AD directory.

actions.name: UnauthorizeApplication
actions.description: Unauthorizes an application from your AWS Directory.

actions.name: UnshareDirectory
actions.description: Stops the directory sharing between the directory owner and consumer accounts.

actions.name: UpdateConditionalForwarder
actions.description: Updates a conditional forwarder that has been set up for your AWS directory.

actions.name: UpdateNumberOfDomainControllers
actions.description: Adds or removes domain controllers to or from the directory. Based on the difference between current value and new value (provided through this API call), domain controllers will be added or removed. It may take up to 45 minutes for any new domain controllers to become fully active once the requested number of domain controllers is updated. During this time, you cannot make another update request.

actions.name: UpdateRadius
actions.description: Updates the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) server information for an AD Connector directory.

actions.name: UpdateTrust
actions.description: Updates the trust that has been set up between your AWS Managed Microsoft AD directory and an on-premises Active Directory.

actions.name: VerifyTrust
actions.description: Verifies a trust relationship between your Microsoft AD in the AWS cloud and an external domain.
